citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at noon on September
20, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door. The inspector was then informed by a
family member that the licensee was not available for the day. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and
records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement
action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at noon on September 
20, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door. The inspector was then informed by a 
family member that the licensee was not available for the day. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and 
records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement 
action. 
 
 
End Section
